actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the moving expense deduction for moving expenses associated with the sale of a residence eligible to receive benefits under an approved airport noise compatibility program.

summary.text: Displaced-by-Airport Noise Homeowner Equity Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to apply the moving expense deduction to moves from residences eligible for benefits under a noise compatibility program.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the moving expense deduction for moving expenses associated with the sale of a residence eligible to receive benefits under an approved airport noise compatibility program.
